DOC.brief_summary: The aim study evaluate safety performance new catheter coating , compare current SpeediCath coating .
DOC.brief_title: Safety Performance New Coating Urinary Intermittent Catheters
DOC.criteria: 1 . Have give write informed consent sign letter authority 2 . Be least 18 year age full legal capacity 3 . Be male 4 . Willing refrain use analgetics 24 hour prior catheterization visit 1 . Abnormalities , diseases surgical procedure perform low urinary tract 2 . Symptoms urinary tract infection ( least one following : frequent urination , sting pain urination ) 3 . Participating interventional clinical investigation investigation ( inclusion termination ) previously participate investigation ( include runin period ) 4 . Known hypersensitivity toward test product
